original_title: 怪奇アンビリーバブル 衝撃！恐怖の心霊地獄巡り
overview: The amount of carefully selected psychic photos from the vast amount of psychic photos sent to be announced from the previous work. This time, "It was really there! "Cursed Video" interview team infiltrates the most terrifying haunted spot! A contributor who is in an occult circle at his university and his friends went to the ruins of ancient temples and abandoned tunnels, which are famous as a haunted spot near Kanto, and mysterious things were reflected. A few days later, a friend who accompanied him was hit by a truck while driving and was hospitalized. It is said that the man captured it because he thought it might have something to do with the posted photo. In order to verify the causal relationship with the photo, we asked the contributor to guide us to the haunted spot and start the investigation.
title: Mysterious Unbelievable Shock! Horrifying Psychic Hell Tour
